mapper.select: SELECT USER_NO userNo, USER_ID userId, USER_PWD userPwd, USER_NAME userName, NICKNAME nickname, PHONE, EMAIL, ADDRESS, ENROLL_DATE enrollDate FROM TB_USER WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} AND STATUS = 'Y'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_USER ( USER_NO, USER_ID, USER_PWD, USER_NAME, EMAIL ) VALUES ( SEQ_UNO.NEXTVAL, #{userId}, #{userPwd}, #{userName}, #{email} )
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_USER SET USER_NAME = #{userName}, EMAIL = #{email} WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} AND STATUS = 'Y'
